parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number of the scheduled task list to return. Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the scaling group to which a scheduled task belongs.

parameters.name: ScalingGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the scaling group in which you want to execute the scheduled task.

parameters.name: ScheduledAction
parameters.description: The actions that you want Auto Scaling to perform when the scheduled task is triggered.

parameters.name: ScheduledTaskId
parameters.description: The total number of scheduled tasks.

parameters.name: ScheduledTaskName
parameters.description: The total number of scheduled tasks.
